attributes.action: Delay one of the April Bank Holidays to August when we might be able to go out.
attributes.additional_details: People will have something to look forward to when we can go out. Many of us are WFH so wont be able to do much in April anyway.
attributes.background: See if we can delay one of the April Bank Holidays to August when we might be able to go out.

rejection.details:
You may wish to sign this petition calling for the same action: https://petition.parliament.uk/petitions/309243

You can find out more about coronavirus and how you can protect yourself and others here:

NHS website: https://www.nhs.uk/conditions/coronavirus-covid-19/
UK Government website: https://www.gov.uk/coronavirus

You can read NHS tips to help if you are worried about coronavirus here: https://www.nhs.uk/oneyou/every-mind-matters/coronavirus-covid-19-anxiety-tips
